name: Language Teaching and Learning: French and Italian
notes: FRE280Y5 (or equivalent), FRE225Y5, FRE240Y5 (or FRE240H5 and FRE241H5), FRE272Y5. Note: FRE225Y5 MUST be completed in the second year OR prior to enrolling in 300/400 level courses in Language Teaching and Learning.
1.0 credit to be chosen among the FRE courses in Teaching and Learning (FRE325H5, 345H5, 352H5, 353H5, 355H5)

programs.name: Language Teaching and Learning: French and Italian (Arts)
